sellerCard.description: I'm Habibur Rahman, a 8-year experienced WordPress developer. I specialize in creating responsive and high-performance websites with custom plugins and themes. Let me help you bring your ideas to life and achieve your online goals. Contact me now for a consultation!

description.content:
Are you looking for WordPress Theme Customization? Do you want to redesign your WordPress website? Then you are the right gig.

I have 8+ years of experience in WordPress customization. I can customize any theme. I can professionally customize your existing WordPress theme to fit all your needs.


WHAT IS INCLUDED IN THIS PACKAGE?


  • ️ Setup Your WordPress Theme Exactly as Demo.
  • ️ WordPress Theme Customization.
  • ️ Plugin Customization.
  • ️ Pixel Perfect layout design.
  • ️ OnPage SEO.
  • ️ Woocommerce store setup.
  • ️ Elementor, Divi, Visual Composer Page Builder.
  • ️ Fix bugs.
  • ️ Payment methods.
  • ️ SSL certificate installation.
  • ️ Social media integration.
  • ️ Contact form integration.
  • ️ Signup form integration.
  • ️ Responsive & Mobile Friendly design.
  • ️ Custom Theme Development.
  • ️ WooCommerce Theme Development.
  • ️ Website Development.


 

WHY HIRE ME?


  • ️ Fast & friendly communication.
  • ️ Video guide for your future content editing.
  • ️ 100% Satisfaction & Refund Guaranty.
  • ️ Lifetime inbox support.

 

PLEASE CONTACT ME BEFORE ORDERING THIS GIG

 

Thanks

Habibur Rahaman

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is your price fixed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The price depends on your design and functionality. It can be more or less than the gig price.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you upload content?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will upload your website content.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I have your email or skype?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, this is against the Terms of Service of Fiverr. I will only respond to messages send here on Fiverr.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you also convert PSD to HTML?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can, but PSD has a different price, so contact me to discuss the project.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide unlimited revisions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I would be happy to revise if the job is not done properly as per the gig ordered.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How much time you need for my project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: It depends on your project. Please show me your design before ordering, then I will tell you about the estimated time.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide support after completion?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will provide you with project completion support which will be totally free of cost.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What kind of technology do you support?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: HTML, CSS, jQuery, SCSS etc. We use HTML, CSS, jQuery, SCSS, Bootstrap , Font awesome, Ionicons etc for frontend development.And PHP,Mysql,WordPress For Backend Development.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer any WordPress Customization Service?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can help you with any WordPress customization-related works. I can even create your themes and plugins from scratch if needed.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I'm ready to purchase your gig! What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You will have to purchase a domain & hosting. Feel free to discuss suggestions if you don't have purchased yet.

reviews.comment: Habibur Rahaman exceeded my expectations in website maintenance. His code expertise and bug-free delivery showcased his professionalism. Plus, his quick responsiveness and fluency in communication made working with him a breeze! 💪

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words! It was a pleasure working with you, and I'm glad I could meet your expectations. Your clear communication and direction made the process smooth and enjoyable. I'm always here to help with any future needs. Looking forward to working together again! 🙌

reviews.comment: Habibur did a fantastic job on my project, knew what I wanted and needed. His work and communication were very professional. I will definitely use him for my next project.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback! I'm delighted to hear that you were pleased with the work and communication. It was a pleasure to understand your needs and deliver exactly what you were looking for. I look forward to working with you again on your next project!

reviews.comment: Habibur Rahaman did an AMAZING job with our website maintenance! His professionalism and attention to detail truly exceeded our expectations. Plus, his quick responsiveness and language fluency made the process smooth and efficient. 👍

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words! It was a pleasure working on your website maintenance. I'm glad to hear that you were pleased with the results and the overall process. Your positive feedback motivates me to continue delivering the best possible service. Looking forward to working with you again in the future! 👍

Thank you so much for your kind words, Aibeelukpo! It was a pleasure working with you on your product page redesign. I'm thrilled to hear that you're satisfied with the results. If you ever need further assistance or have more projects in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out.

reviews.comment: Habibur is always ready to assist and explain, very patient and provides excellent standard of work
